title: WasteWaterTreatment - Off-gas Stack
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Off-gas Stack made for the Wastewater treatment domain. This entity represents stacks that are present in some wastewatertreatment plants where the emissions, greenhouse gases included, are emitted.

N2O.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'ppm'. N2O gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

CO2.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'ppm'. CO2 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

CH4.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'ppm'. CH4 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

O2.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'ppm'. O2 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

startsAt.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the entity the Off Gas Stack is connected to in the upstream point.

endsAt.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the entity the Off Gas Stack is connected to in the downstream point.
